data.title: List of NBA career playoff assists leaders
data.meta_description:
This article provides two lists:A list of National Basketball Association (NBA) players by total career playoff assists recorded.
A progressive list of assist leaders showing how the record increased through the years.
data.text:
From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

This article provides two lists:

A list of National Basketball Association (NBA) players by total career playoff assists recorded.

A progressive list of assist leaders showing how the record increased through the years.[1]
